question: Let <katex>$f(x)=|\begin{matrix}cos~x&x&1\\ 2~sin~x&x&2x\\ sin~x&x&x\end{matrix}|.$</katex> Then <katex>$lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{f(x)}{x^{2}}=$</katex>
explanation: Evaluating determinant gives <katex>$x \sin x - x^2 \cos x$</katex>. Limit <katex>$\frac{x \sin x - x^2 \cos x}{x^2} = \frac{\sin x}{x} - \cos x$</katex>. As <katex>$x \to 0$</katex>, <katex>$1 - 1 = 0$</katex>.
